column6:
3 bedroom with Casper mattresses (king, queen, full) 
and blackout curtains
 
Driveway parking - two cars
 
HiSpeed WiFi, Smart TVs, Netflix, Hulu, AmazonPrime apps

Master suite w/ clawfoot tub, rainfall shower

Big kitchen, modern appliances

Close to MedCenter, Rice, Downtown, NRG

Walk score 86! Walk / cheap Uber to best bars & restaurants
